channel.title: Combined Politepol Feed
channel.description: Merged feed from multiple Politepol sources

item.title: Why IAF’s Shubhanshu Shukla is only the 2nd astronaut to be awarded Ashoka Chakra
Was Alex Pretti holding a gun when he was shot down by federal agents?
Republic Day 2026: How a military parade became India’s R-Day tradition
Who are Ursula von der Leyen and Antonio Costa, top EU officials and Republic Day chief guests?
How your takeaway coffee is leaking microplastics into your body
Bhairav Battalion, animal contingent and more... How this R-Day parade will be different
Look beyond FTA: A chastened, humbled, pragmatic Europe could be a great strategic partner for India
item.description: Trump’s attempted Greenland grab was one abuse too many even for the collective docility of a self-pitying continent

item.title: How India-Israel ties go far beyond Trump’s ‘Board of Peace’
item.description: Neither the Gaza conflict nor any externally driven peace architecture alters the foundational logic of India-Israel cooperation, which rests on capability, reliability, and shared security experiences rather than ideological alignment

item.title: India-EU trade deal: Europe’s bet to hedge a Trumpian world order
item.description: Europe’s response to a rattled global order and the fracture in transatlantic ties has been clear, coherent, and deliberate: diversify risk, deepen partnerships. India sits at the apex of that strategy

item.title: How Yunus is locking Bangladesh into a Sino-Pakistani power trap
item.description: Bangladesh risks becoming another case study – a nation that traded long-term sovereignty for short-term political consolidation. The Sino-Pakistani axis does not merely sell weapons or build dams; it exports a model of control, leverage, and quiet coercion

item.title: Discovering Rann: Festivals, heritage and cultural treasures
item.description: There is no better time of the year to visit Gujarat’s Rann of Kutch than in winter, with the surrounding places offering a rich blend of history, culture and fun

item.title: How US is ‘rediscovering’ Japan to check China
item.description: The US is ‘rediscovering’ Japan to pit it against its ancient enemy: China, which has not forgotten what Japan did to it in the 1940s
